name: Instagram Carousel Template by Human Deluxe
description:
Share knowledge, tell stories and grow your audience on Instagram or Linkedin. Following the AIDA-model preached by the likes of Chris Do or Dave Talas, I am sharing our very own Instagram Carousel template.


If you want to be very much like the original, get a license of the "Champion" typeface for titles â€“ however, feel free to adapt this template and make it your own.


I also included a top performing post from my own Instagram channel (instagram.com/johannesippen) for you to play around with.


Human Deluxe is an international Design Studio based in Berlin, Germany. Founded in 2019, we regularly work with big clients like SAP and Zynga, but also startups and non-profits.
